title: AIRPLANE! 30th Anniversary Special Collector's Edition [DVD-9] [
description:
TITLE:	AIRPLANE! 30th Anniversary Special Collector's Edition
YEAR:	1980
FORMAT:	DVD-9, PAL, 2011 Paramount Home Entertainment UK Ltd., Untouched
SIZE:	7,31GB

DO YOU LIKE MOVIES ABOUT GLADIATORS?
HAVE YOU EVER SEEN A GROWN MAN... NEVER MIND!

This is the "30th Anniversary Special Collector's Edition" of that high-flying, smash-hit comedy farce, "AIRPLANE!".
Robert Hays and Julie Hagerty join panickly passengers, inept ground controllers and an inflatable auto-pilot (named "Otto", of course) in the disaster-film spoof voted "one of the 10 funniest movies ever made" by the American Film Institute. Surely, you won't find a funnier film on DVD. And don't call me Shirley!


ASSUME CRACK-UP POSITION! (DVD SPECIAL FEATURES)	
* Commentary by Producer Jon Davison and Writers/ Directors Jim Abrahams,Jerry Zucker and David Zucker;
* Long Haul Version. Loaded with over 4 Hours of Special Features,Including Deleted Scenes, Interviews and Many More!;
* Trivia Track Text Commentary;
* Theatrical Trailer.



Main Feature Audio:		English 5.1 Dolby Digital Surround
Commentary:			English 2.1 Dolby Digital Surround
Feature Subtitles:		English for the hearing impaires, English
Commentary Subtitles:		English
Trivia Track Text Commentary:	English
Aspect Ratio:			1.78:1 Anamorphic Screen
Main Feature Running Time:	Approx. 84 mins
Long Haul Version Running Time:	Approx. 243 mins
